sections: The All-in-One Marketing & Business Automation Platform.

Inspired by modular architectures like Odoo, Netpick provides a comprehensive suite of modules for business management and automation. It is designed to be an integrated and extensible ecosystem where modules seamlessly interact with each otherâ€”covering CRM, Lead Management, Campaigns, and more.
Netpick is built on the philosophy of modularity. Just like building blocks, you can use modules independently or combine them to create a powerful, unified system for your business.

The goal is to create a seamless experience where data flows freely between different parts of your operations, from gathering leads to managing customer relationships and executing marketing campaigns.
MailMine is the first module in the Netpick family. Developed as a standalone product, it serves as a powerful web scraping and lead generation tool.
In the future, MailMine will be available as an installable module within the Netpick ecosystem, allowing retrieved leads to be directly fed into your Netpick CRM and marketing pipelines.
The Ultimate Web Scraping & Lead Generation Platform.

MailMine is a sophisticated web scraping and lead generation solution designed to streamline the process of gathering business intelligence. Whether you are a marketer looking for leads, a recruiter finding candidates, or a data analyst gathering insights, MailMine provides the tools to automate the extraction of emails, links, and contact information from the web.
Advanced Web Scraping: Powered by Jsoup and Selenium to handle complex websites.
Smart Query Generation: Automatically generate search queries tailored to specific industries and roles.
Interactive Dashboard: Visualize your scraping jobs, success rates, and data collection in real-time.
Secure Authentication: Enterprise-grade security with JWT tokens and role-based access control.
High Performance: Asynchronous processing for handling multiple scraping jobs simultaneously.
Responsive Design: Fully responsive admin panel built with the latest Tailwind CSS.
This project is built using a modern, robust tech stack ensuring scalability and performance.
More documentation for other HKH-soft projects will be added here soon.
Check out our GitHub profile for more.
The MailMine backend exposes a RESTful API for managing scraping jobs, users, and data.
To get a local copy up and running, follow these simple steps.
Ensure you have the following installed on your system:
npm or yarn (Package manager for frontend)
The backend API will be available at http://localhost:8080
The frontend will be available at http://localhost:3000
Create a PostgreSQL database named mailmine
Flyway migrations will run automatically on startup

Access the App
Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:3000.
Access your dashboard securely. The system supports persistent login sessions.
Then in Control select what part of the scraping you want to start.
Monitor the progress in real-time on the dashboard.
